plot: A young Scottish girl's cat, Thomasina, apparently dies at the hands of her widowed veterinarian father. The strained relationship between the girl and her father is eventually repaired with the return of Thomasina and the aid of a beautiful and mysterious &"witch&" who seems to have powers to revive and heal animals.
title: The Three Lives of Thomasina
plot_es: A young Scottish girl's cat, Thomasina, apparently dies at the hands of her widowed veterinarian father.
